page.title: 08Climbing at Beecraigs
page.content: The instruction and activities at Beecraigs are excellent. I can say this because I have sampled them many times myself. The worst thing about climbing is that it takes so long to set up the equipment. This was certainly true with us as it took about half an hour to set it all up, but it was worth it. At first we were feeding out the rope to someone who was going down the hillside and then pulling them back up. Then we went on to the more exciting abseiling. This was definitely the better of the two and after we had been at it for a little while we had races. This involved abseiling down the hill, unhooking yourself from the rope and climbing back up it.
